jd: From: Balaji, TTDATAS balaji@ttdatas.com Reply to: balaji@ttdatas.com Hi ALL,Greetings from TTData LLC..!! I hope you are doing well. I do have a job opening for Tech BA with MDM position for our client based out at Bay Area, CA(Hybrid). Please find the below requirement kindly share me updated profile along with contact details asap. Title: Tech BA with MDM Location: Bay Area, CA(Hybrid). Duration: Long Term Required Skills: Need Technical BA with Asset Domain Reltio Thanks & Regards Balaji V Talent Acquisition Specialist TT Data LLC Disclaimer: Under Bills.1618 Title III passed by the 105th U.S. Congress this mail cannot be considered spam as long as we include contact information and a REMOVE link for removal from our mailing list. To be removed from our mailing list reply with "remove" and include your "original email address/addresses" in the subject heading. We will immediately update it accordingly. We apologize for the inconvenience if any caused
